remarks.remarks: (Dalgaon - Agriculture Department have submitted the crop area affected due to flood was 35 Ha. But after re-assessment they have found crop area affected under Dalgaon Revenue Circle is 240Ha.)
(Jonai - 1 Pickup of Firewood is also distributed in Relief Camp., 2 No's  pickup truck (vehicle)   of Fire wood also distributed in relief camp.)
(Tingkhong - All damaged houses entered in the portal in Fully damaged filled should be read as severely damaged houses. (As there is no filled for entering severally damaged house No))

(Lanka - ADO Circle kaki Agriculture land 11 Hect. sali paddy submerge under Lanka Revenue Circle.), (Doboka - Crop Submergence report submitted by ADO Choudhury Bazar dated 04.09.2024- Sali Paddy (230), Crop submergence report submitted by ADO Choudhury Bazar dated 05/09/2024- Sali Paddy (189 ha))
